paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a novel somatic pathogenic BRCA2 variant identified in a case report.

patients.phenotype: no associated personal or family history of breast and/or ovarian cancers

individual_records.phenotype_details: no associated personal or family history of breast and/or ovarian cancers
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a 72-year-old woman with no associated personal or family history of breast and/or ovarian cancers, we identified a novel somatic pathogenic BRCA2 variant.

functional_data.summary: Identified using next-generation sequencing and high-resolution melting analysis.

variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on novel identification and variant allele frequency.
variants.additional_notes: The variant allele frequency (VAF) was 16%, and Sanger sequencing was unable to identify this variant.
key_quotes: we identified a novel somatic pathogenic BRCA2 variant (c.18_28delAGAGAGGCCAA, p.Lys6Asnfs*4)

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
